page.title: 18ECOLOGY-GALSTON
page.content: E.C./01/02/03/04/05/06/07/08/09/10/11 ------------------------------------- SCR./13/19/10/04/08/15/--/15/05/06/09 ------------------------------------- TOTAL SCORE:104 GRADE:2 (high ec.val) EVALUATION CRITERIA 1.Vascular plant diversity index. 2.Woodland structure index. 3.Age of trees in canopy layer. 4.Representation of indigenous species in the canopy. 5. " " " " " " shrub layers. 6.Presence of additional habitats in the woodland. 8.Area of woodland. 9.Presence of rare species of special interest in the site. 10.Site antiquity index. 11.Current land-use factors. Designation-wetland:Source-Kilmarnock and Loudoun Irvine Valley Plan.
